name: Lights Out alpha 0.35
description:
Light's Out is a game about a secret goverment facility that was infested with zombies. As you go through the various flours of the infrastructure to turn the power back on and find survivors you will have to fight and kill the many zombies that took over it. To do so you can buy weapons, health and ammo as well as find them throughout the game on the floor.

The game is still in being developed and the video does NOT represent the end result of this game.

Light's Out is an indie game that is being developed by a single person (myself). The goal is to get it released on Steam Direct once I feel like it is sale worthy and have the backup of you guys to upvote it.

Controls:

AWSD - movement

Mouse1 -  fire

E/F - pick up/interact

P - Pause
